articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: Weird: The Al Yankovic Story trailer is a perfect parody of music biopics
articles.description: The latest trailer for The Roku Channel’s Weird Al Yankovic movie parodies musical biopics in all the right ways. The movie stars Daniel Radcliffe and is set to release on Nov. 4.
articles.content: The new trailer hits all the important beats in a very silly way

articles.author: Owen S. Good
articles.title: Sony establishes PlayStation Mobile division, buys Savage Game Studios
articles.description: Sony announced it has acquired Savage Game Studios and would bring it aboard its PlayStation Studios group to helm a new PlayStation Mobile division.
articles.content: Sony has acquired mobile games developer Savage Game Studios and will bring it into its PlayStation Studios stable, but the bigger news may be that Sony is planning a major push into mobile gaming, c… [+2579 chars]

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Netflix cancels Resident Evil series after one season
articles.description: The Resident Evil TV series at Netflix has been canceled, Deadline reported Friday, citing low viewership numbers and high costs.
articles.content: Netflixs live-action Resident Evil series will not get a second season, Deadline reported Friday. Despite grand, long-term plans for the television adaptation of Capcoms survival horror franchise, th… [+1580 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Teburu could be the digital board game system that finally catches on
articles.description: Digital board games have come and gone over the years, but Teburu could be the first to actually catch on, and a new partnership with Vampire: The Masquerade could broaden its appeal. A special preview from Gen Con 2022.
articles.content:
After nearly two decades covering Gen Con, the worlds largest tabletop gaming convention, Ive gotten pretty sick and tired of hearing about digitized board game tables and consoles.
Touch-sensitive … [+7686 chars]

articles.author: Nicole Clark
articles.title: Megan Thee Stallion had a great time at Japan’s Super Nintendo World
articles.description: Megan Thee Stallion visited Super Mario World during her trip to Japan to perform in the Summer Sonic 2022 festival. She also went to a JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure art exhibition.
articles.content: It looks like Megan Thee Stallion has had an incredible time in Japan, from cosplaying as Sailor Moon to taking a trip to the Super Nintendo World amusement park. She shared her thoughts on the trip,… [+1720 chars]

articles.author: Charlie Hall
articles.title: Homeworld 3 gameplay preview: Fight like a fish
articles.description: The developers of Homeworld 3 are on a mission to fulfill the promise of Homeworld 2, more than 20 years delayed. In this hands-on demo we piloted schools of heavily armed fish inside a massive space structure — not unlike a coral reef.

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: The Last of Us Part 1 accessibility adds DualSense haptic feedback for subtitles
articles.description: Naughty Dog’s PS5 remake of The Last of Us will include new accessibility options, including using the DualSense controller’s vibration to emphasize subtitles.
articles.content: Its just one of Naughty Dogs new accessibility features for The Last of Us Part 1

articles.author: Austen Goslin
articles.title: House of the Dragon renewed for season 2 after massive debut
articles.description: House of the Dragon season 2 is officially happening. HBO announced that the Game of Thrones prequel will return for another season after the series’ record setting debut. House of the Dragon season 2 is likely to release in 2023.
articles.content: HBO has another smash hit on its hands with House of the Dragon, its Game of Thrones successor show. The series debuted Sunday to an impressive audience of nearly 10 million people, making it one of … [+1562 chars]

articles.author: Joshua Rivera
articles.title: Battlefield 2042 season 2 adds a new map and a man with an insane gun
articles.description: Battlefield 2042’s second season, called Master of Arms adds a new map set in Panama and a new specialist with a massive gun every player on his team can use. It’s not as big a shakeup as the first season, but maybe that’s a good thing.
articles.content: Bullets for now, a pint for later

articles.author: Michael McWhertor
articles.title: Aliens: Fireteam Elite will finally let you fight the Queen in Pathogen DLC
articles.description: Left 4 Dead-like co-op shooter Aliens: Fireteam Elite is adding a Xenomorph Queen fight, thanks to the paid Pathogen expansion launching Aug. 30.
articles.content: Aliens: Fireteam Elite is adding a Xenomorph Queen fight
